text: Markaa haddii la ogaado inay labaduba galeen dambi, labo kale baa meeshood joogsan ( oo la dhaarin), ka mid ah kuwaa xaq ku sheeganaya, labada u xiga qaraabo ahaan. Markaa waa inay labadaa ku dhaartaan Allaah (iyagoo odhanaya) wallee maraggayaga baa ka xaqsan maraggooda, mana xadgudbin, (haddii aan xadgudubno) waxaanu hubaal markaa ka mid ahaaneynaa geflowyada
